Blog.post: urlLink Thats Nancy and Annabelle. Judas and I are their friendly enemies. It's a love hate relationship. For christmas we wrapped Annabelle in 4 layers of wrapping paper and covered her with bows. Nancy didn't like the idea. Judas and I thought it was hilarious.

Hey, I'm new to this photo thing and yea I oculd put a thousand camp photos up but I'm really interested in what people want to see and what they want to know about me. Feel free to comment on everything and anything for this first month or so while I try things out. Thanks.
urlLink This is Marc Koch (camp director) and Kenny Jay (CIT director) playing at the horse shoe pits that my friends and I dug. The pits were hot.
urlLink This is where I go to camp. Fairview Lake is a really nice place. There are cabins there, too. It's not just a lake. That would be weird.

urlLink This was me in camp. I'm normally this mello quiet black kid. Minding my own business. "Black" Will thought it would be nice if he dressed us all up one day. So, since I only where Khakis, for one day I was "Khaki Thunder". I'm all the way on the right. Ypp. Thats me.

So I decided that my other blog (if you don't have it don't ask) was too involved. This one is clean. Just random stuff here. Anything I can find that I want to put here I will. I don't know exactly what I want to do but I'm sure I'll think of something. Maybe it'll be a photo essay... Who knows? Not me. Obviously. Anyway chill well.
urlLink This is my eye. If you look closely you can see steph taking a picture of it.
urlLink This is Larissa. She's odd. Notice you can see Nancy in the back sharpening her nails ready to claw my eyes out.
urlLink This is my friend Sam. He's a little weird. He's nice though. But weird.
urlLink This is Steph and I playing DDR in Atlanta. It was her first time. Yup she was a virgin DDR player, but thanks to Sam, myself and a few quarters we robbed her of her virginity.
urlLink This is Steph. She's my gf. Yea pretty sexy, I know. Hands off though, I have dibs.
